Package org.cpnsim.datacenter

Interface LoadBalance

All Superinterfaces:
DatacenterEntity
All Known Implementing Classes:
LoadBalanceBatch, LoadBalanceRound
public interface LoadBalance extends DatacenterEntity
An interface to be implemented by each class that represents a load balancer. After the Instance arrives at the datacenter, it is necessary to allocate each instance to each IntraScheduler through it.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Jiawen Liu
